name: ORRICK, HERRINGTON & SUTCLIFFE LLP (ON BEHALF OF JINKOSOLAR U.S.)
description: Law Firm on behalf of Solar Panel manufacturer.
govEntities: Office of the Vice President of the United States
sampleDescriptions: Issues related to domestic manufacturing of solar panels and import/export of solar cells.
